title: Ticket #3899: Interactive batch_test.pl use on windows
description: The situation was that no one had been able to run the testing framework in windows. There was only one code issue. This was that when checking for things using CondorUtils.pm::Which, the file test used was -x which did not yeild to Which finding it. I converted this to -f and things could proceed after the master was found. There will be additional information on our wiki about how I set up a usable windows interactive test environment
creator: bt
